attributes.title: This app killed my brother
attributes.review: I got the app just to see what it was all about. Shortly after secret service came to my door and made my disabled brother (without legs), run up the stairs of a local Chinese restaurant. They then fed him dumplings that were poisoned to make him speak through his butt hole.

attributes.title: Stupid Disappointed American
